enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
section_title: ANNEX I PARTIES ` NATIONAL COMMUNICATIONS: Compilation and synthesis of fourth national communications
sentences: 1 and 2) was addressed by the SBI plenary on 4 December and in a contact group and informal consultations co-chaired by Sushma Gera (Canada) and Hongwei Yang (China).
During the discussions, the G-77/China expressed concern over growing emissions in Annex I parties and proposed including reference to emission trends and Annex I policies and measures.
The EU, Japan, Canada and New Zealand preferred straightforward conclusions thanking the Secretariat.
Parties also discussed the submission deadline for the fifth national communications.
However, the discussions were not controversial and the SBI adopted short conclusions on 10 December, with the COP adopting the decision on 14 December.
